Name: Sketcher's Pet
Ingredients: 22.5 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Flute glass .
Review: A sweet creamy, fruity dessert style cocktail.
History: Created in January 2010 by Zdenek Kestanek at Quo Vadis, London, England for Petek Sketcher.
Nutrition: One serving of Sketcher's Pet contains 248 calories
